creator: SL-Solutions
descriptionHtml:
Discover the world of rocks and minerals with Rock Identifier! This innovative mobile app empowers you to identify a variety of rocks and gems with just a snap or a simple upload. It's an essential tool for anyone curious about geology and the natural world.

Key features:

Effortlessly identify thousands of rocks and minerals
Impressive accuracy in identification
Beautiful, user-friendly interface for seamless navigation
Enhanced search functionality for over 6000 types of rocks
Expanded content and resources for a deeper dive into geology
Experience the Joy of Rock and Mineral Identification Encounter intriguing rocks and minerals in your adventures? Eager to delve into the world of rock hunting? Snap a photo of any crystal or gemstone and receive an instant, precise identification. With a database containing over 6000 types of rocks, this rock scanner app is the perfect companion for recognizing, examining, and exploring the characteristics of stones in mere seconds.

From professional geologists and mineral explorers to hobbyists, students, and teachers, Rock Identifier provides the easiest and most comprehensive guide to rocks, catering to a diverse range of enthusiasts.

Personalized Assistance from Geologists In addition to offering extensive knowledge on mineralogy and petrology, this scanner app provides a personalized email service for one-on-one inquiries. It's like having a geologist at your fingertips!

Why Choose Rock Identifier?

Identify stones, crystals, and minerals with your phone camera
Access a professional geology toolkit at your fingertips
Learn in-depth details about rocks, including their names, hardness, color, luster, and chemical formulae
Document your rock and gem discoveries with this identification app
An invaluable educational resource for geology students, teachers, and experts seeking to deepen their understanding of mineralogy
Ideal for adventurers, mineral collectors, and gem hunters keen on expanding their knowledge of rocks
Unleash Your Geological Curiosity With Rock Identifier, you can identify rocks from photos, discover and learn more about the geological record, contribute your observations, and record your journey through the captivating realm of geology. Embark on a journey of exploration, learning, and documentation with Rock Identifier!
descriptionShort: Identify rock, crystal, stone, mineral, gem by photo. Geology rocks identifier
